nodes.text: Marcus Augur was a pilot for the Galactic Republic during the High Republic Era. Marcus died while on board a Longbeam alongside Jedi Knight Te'Ami around 232 BBY while retrieving the flight recorder of the Legacy Run during the fortieth Emergence. While stopping a missile shot from the Lourna Dee from destroying the recorder, they were shot by another missile. This killed Te'Ami, Marcus, and fellow pilot Beth Petters.
